features.featureDescription: Tools (such as Azure Purview or Azure Information Protection) can be used for data discovery and classification in the service.
features.featureGuidance: Use tools such as Azure Purview, Azure Information Protection, and Azure SQL Data Discovery and Classification to centrally scan, classify and label any sensitive data that resides in Azure, on-premises, Microsoft 365, or other locations.
features.customerActionsDescription: Discover, classify, and label sensitive data
